title: First Mover Americas: Is Bitcoin Rallying Ahead of Schedule?
description: The latest price moves in bitcoin (BTC) and crypto markets in context for March 1, 2024. First Mover is CoinDesk’s daily newsletter that contextualizes the latest actions in the crypto markets.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Crypto traders in Nigeria are up in arms after Binance removed the naira from its peer-to-peer service. Bitcoin (BTC) retraced a portion of its recent rally on the same day Grayscale’s spot Bitcoin ETF saw outflows of nearly $600 million. Meanwhile, an investment firm founded by a prominent Wall Street trader wants to short Coinbase stock.

Cryptocurrency trading platform Binance has removed the Nigerian naira from its peer-to-peer (P2P) service following claims from the government that the platform was contributing to the devaluation of the currency.

Presidential adviser Bayo Onanuga said Binance would destroy the Nigerian economy if not stopped because it arbitrarily fixes foreign exchange rates.

Read more

description:
